title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 22 November 2016 - XWiki
content:
<MasterPiece> has joined #xwiki  
01:39 <MasterPiece> has quit  
05:37 <polx> has joined #xwiki  
05:42 <polx> has quit  
08:18 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
08:59 <polx> has joined #xwiki  
08:59 <polx> has quit  
09:17 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
09:25 <gdelhumeau> has joined #xwiki  
09:30 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
10:14 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
10:25 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
11:09 <vmassol> tmortagne: seems like LocalizationSS doesn't have an API for taking a locale as an input param. I need to display some content on an wiki by using the locale passed into query string and I'm in velocity. Any idea?  
11:10 <vmassol> (using XWiki 8.4)  
11:11 <tmortagne> indeed the localization SS is only looking at current locale right now  
11:11 <tmortagne> you could change the current locale in the context but you would need PR I think  
11:11 <vmassol> yep and I'd need to some try/finally  
11:11 <vmassol> which is hard in velocity  
11:12 <vmassol> I guess I could work around by using groovy FTM  
11:12 <vmassol> (not very nice)  
11:12 <vmassol> (but doable in my case)  
11:12 <vmassol> (PR is not so much an issue)  
11:13 <tmortagne> isn't #try/#catch enough for this ?  
11:13 <vmassol> no  
11:13 <vmassol> it's only #try  
11:13 <vmassol> and it'll fill the $exception binding only if there's an ecception  
11:14 <vmassol> I guess I could work  
11:14 <vmassol> s/I/it  
11:14 <vmassol> yes you're right it should be enough actually  
11:15 <vmassol> I'll still need PR but at least it's simpler and acceptable if we don't have any better solution  
11:15 <vmassol> I'll create a jira issue for the future  
11:15 <tmortagne> now the chance of getting an exception while calling render() is almost non existant  
11:16 <vmassol> http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-13891  
11:23 <evalica> has quit  
11:44 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki  
11:50 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
12:55 <Pbas> has quit  
13:28 <Denis1> has joined #xwiki  
13:30 <Denis> has quit  
13:39 <vmassol> @gdelhumeau: I have some comment on the new language settings in 8.4. Do you think you could point me to the jira you've used to implement it?  
13:39 <vmassol> thx  
13:47 <Pbas> has joined #xwiki  
13:57 <vmassol> guys master is still completely broken :(  
13:57 <vmassol> been broken for  a long time now  
13:57 <vmassol> not good  
13:57 <vmassol> try building xwiki-enterprise and you'll see  
13:58 <vmassol> I needed a working master XE  
13:58 <vmassol> and I can't  
13:58 <vmassol> that's disapointing  
14:25 <sdumitriu1> has quit  
14:33 <sdumitriu1> has joined #xwiki  
14:55 <D-Spair> has quit  
15:03 <D-Spair> has joined #xwiki  
15:29 <Denis> has joined #xwiki  
15:30 <Denis1> has quit  
17:01 <Aranjedeath> has joined #xwiki  
17:41 <Raipin> has joined #xwiki  
17:42 <Raipin> So I'm having issues getting xwiki to work with my nginx server (seperate servers). Anyone happen to make this work?  
18:11 <tmortagne> Enygma`: is it ok to commit on commons and platform ?  
18:11 <tmortagne> I mean on 8.4.x branch  
18:21 <mflorea> has quit  
18:22 <gdelhumeau> has quit  
18:28 <evalica> has quit  
18:39 <tmortagne> has quit  
18:40 <Enygma`> has quit  
19:59 \* daemoen grumbles  
19:59 <daemoen> hey guys :)  
19:59 <daemoen> vmassol: ping -- re tomcat regression bug  
20:00 <vmassol> hi daemoen  
20:00 <daemoen> hey :)  
20:00 <daemoen> so, i tried to stir up some activity on the regression bug again  
20:00 <vmassol> on the tomcat lists?  
20:00 <daemoen> and it really seems like tomcat is quite content to just leave it as it is now  
20:00 <daemoen> yeap  
20:01 <vmassol> so the issue is not fixed, I thought it was  
20:01 <vmassol> do you remember the url for the issue I raised  
20:01 <vmassol> you have commented on it?  
20:01 <daemoen> yeah, one sec, ill forward you my thread;  which email ?  
20:01 <vmassol> I thought I had convinced the guy that it was important  
20:01 <daemoen> as far as i saw, they still have only fixed it for the 9.0 branch  
20:01 <vmassol> it \*is\* important  
20:01 <vmassol> since they have a bug :)  
20:02 <daemoen> its a horrible semver violation, lol  
20:02 <daemoen> i find it rather surprising that they were this happy to break semver on a major public project like this  
20:02 <vmassol> yeah I don't understand either  
20:02 <vmassol> we show them a proof that they broke backward compat and they don't care....  
20:02 <vmassol> go figure....  
20:02 <vmassol> that shows that xwiki is a much better managed project :)  
20:03 <daemoen> in this case, absolutely  
20:03 <vmassol> if someone comes to us with a regression it's fixed under 1 or 2 days at most!  
20:03 <daemoen> tomcat used to be a stand up project  
20:03 <vmassol> (when not in one hour ;))  
20:03 <daemoen> ever since it became part of apache, i feel like its regressed in thinking a bit  
20:04 <vmassol> that must be ages ago :) I 've only known it as part of apache I think  
20:04 <vmassol> so at least before 2000  
20:04 <daemoen> hmmm.... didnt think it was that long ago  
20:04 <daemoen> doesnt feel that way  
20:06 <daemoen> which email you want me to send this to?  your massol.net addess ?  
20:08 <vmassol> sorry what do you want to send me?  
20:08 <daemoen> the email thread, unless youre still subscribed to the tomcat dev list  
20:09 <vmassol> the best would be to find the mail archive for that thread  
20:09 <vmassol> and link it to the jira issue we have for it  
20:09 <daemoen> one sec, let me see if i can dig that up right quick =D  
20:09 <vmassol> google should give you the link  
20:09 <vmassol> if you search for the subject  
20:10 <daemoen> yeap, working on it  
20:11 <daemoen> got it  
20:11 <vmassol> cool  
20:13 <daemoen> are you guys running hosted jira or on demand ?  
20:13 <vmassol> got to go in 5mn, tennis time!  
20:13 <vmassol> on premises  
20:13 \* daemoen nods  
20:14 <vmassol> hosted  
20:14 <vmassol> (hosted in our infra)  
20:14 <vmassol> our = xwiki sas infra  
20:21 <vmassol> thanks daemoen  
20:21 <daemoen> yepyep,  i know that bug has plagued many of us, so wanted to see if i could kickstart something, lol  
20:21 <vmassol> nice of you  
20:22 <daemoen> why wouldnt i try to help, i love xwiki =D  
20:22 <daemoen> lol  
20:22 <vmassol> :)  
20:22 <daemoen> now go enjoy your tennis :p ;)  
20:22 <vmassol> are you on 8.4 already?  
20:22 <vmassol> yeah I really need to go  
20:22 <vmassol> already late :)  
20:22 <daemoen> im actually installing it fresh on a new instance right now in fact  
20:22 <vmassol> great  
20:22 <vmassol> 8.4.1 is out  
20:23 <daemoen> well get going,  i lurk in here, so we can catch up another time :)  
20:23 <vmassol> (almost out)  
20:23 <vmassol> (will be officially out by tomorrow)  
20:23 <vmassol> gtg bfn  
20:23 <daemoen> l8r  
20:25 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki

23:15 <vmassol> has quit
